A time-traveling adventure movie where a group of friends accidentally discover a portal that takes them to different eras in history. They must navigate through various challenges and obstacles while trying to find their way back home.

A romantic comedy set in a small town where two childhood sweethearts are reunited after years apart. As they try to rekindle their relationship, they must also confront their past mistakes and learn to forgive each other.

A post-apocalyptic thriller where a group of survivors must fight against hordes of zombies and other dangers to find a new home. Along the way, they discover hidden secrets about the world's collapse and must decide whether to stay and rebuild or continue on their journey.
A historical drama based on real-life events during World War II. The story follows a young woman who joins the resistance movement and risks her life to help save her country from Nazi occupation.

A sci-fi action movie where a team of astronauts embark on a mission to explore a distant planet. However, they soon discover that the planet is inhabited by hostile aliens and must use all their skills and resources to survive and return home safely.
